actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act in order to exempt motor vehicles operated or purchased in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements.

summary.text: Exempts motor vehicles operated or purchased in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements. Provides that no State or political subdivision thereof shall adopt or attempt to enforce any standard relating to the removal of emission control devices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act in order to exempt motor vehicles operated or purchased in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements.
